quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Runescape and Lfd
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, greenfield, following. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Is is true that in RuneScape, the Corporeal Beast is level 311, the highest level?
Which of these is the best type of RuneScape weapon for non members?
Christopher Greenfield is the creator of the RuneScape game.
Setting off a car alarm scares off the zombies in LFD.
Unlike in other video or PC games you cannot save a game in LFD and then come back later to play it from where you left off.
What is the main difference between LFD1 and LFD2 in regard to use of weapons?

options.text: In LFD2 you can use a flame thrower.
In LFD1 there are no melee weapons like the ax or the machete.
In LFD1 there are no pipe bombs.
In LFD2 you can throw hand grenades.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In LFD1 there are no melee weapons like the ax or the machete.

questions.question: The creator of RuneScape was helped by his cousin in developing the game.
Which of these RuneScape quests is the most difficult?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monkey Madness

questions.question: A pipe bomb is an ideal weapon to destroy LFD zombies because it is a silent weapon and they wont hear it when you throw it among a group of them.
Which of these RuneScape weapons is the most powerful?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ahrims staff

questions.question: Name the female character and one of the four survivors in LFD1.
Name the fictional government agency or organization that was supposed to fight the infection and evacuate people from infected areas in LFD.
Did any Runescape player manage to kill the Corporal Beast by themselves without abusing a glitch during the first year of the Beasts release?
On Tutorial Island of RuneScape you get runes from a male character.
Which of the following is not a place in RuneScape?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Duel Wars

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Lfd2 and Following
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, following. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In LFD2 the achievement known as the CHAIN OF COMMAND is awarded for which of the following?

options.text: Tying up one of the special infected with some chain
Using a chainsaw to cut through some dense brush
Killing 100 Common Infected with the chainsaw
Whipping one of the zombies with a piece of chain

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Killing 100 Common Infected with the chainsaw

questions.question: Zelda, featured in The Legend of Zelda series of video games, is what kind of character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The princess

questions.question: What is the name of the race car driver encountered in the Dead Center campaign of LFD2?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jimmy Gibbs Jr.

questions.question: You can add more maps and campaigns in LFD1 and LFD2.
What is the currency used in the Legend of Zelda video game series?
Which of these is not a race featured in the Legend of Zelda video games?
Is there a game called Super Mario Tennis?
In LFD2 the Parish campaign takes place in this city.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New Orleans

questions.question: What pestilence or disease caused people to turn into zombies and deformed some of them into super mutants in LFD?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The green flu

questions.question: In both LFD1 and LFD2, accumulating more cash than the other survivors will give you an advantage.
What unique Zord do the Time Force Rangers have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Time Shadow

questions.question: Which of these items is always in Links arsenal in the Legend of Zelda games?
What is the name of fictional band featured in LFD2?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Midnight Riders

questions.question: In LFD1 the achievement known as Do Not Disturb is awarded for which of the following?

options.text: Not interrupting a fellow survivor when he is busy shooting at one of the zombies
Not waking up your fellow survivors while they are sleeping in the safehouse
Not disturbing a zombie while its eating someone
Sneaking past all Witches in a campaign without disturbing one

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sneaking past all Witches in a campaign without disturbing one

questions.question: In The Legend of Zelda series of video games Zelda possesses which piece of the Triforce?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mario Power Tennis and Nintendo
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, kart, game. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: There are Mario games featuring racing, baseball, soccer, tennis, and golf.
Which of the following characters is NOT a sidekick in Super Mario Strikers?
What is Luigis power shot in Mario Power Tennis?

options.text: He sucks the ball with a vacuum.
He jumps really high and slams the ball.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A hammer

questions.question: Which one of these game systems was released by Nintendo?
In Mario Power Tennis, Bowsers racket has spikes on it.
What is the most basic court in Mario Power Tennis?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peach Dome

questions.question: Captain Falcon, from the F-Zero video games, is a pirate.
Which of these games was not released by Nintendo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Assassins Creed

questions.question: Sonic the Hedgehog is the protagonist of a video game, released by Nintendo.
Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee can be unlocked by beating the game with every character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Game and Watch

questions.question: Which Super Smash Bros. Melee character can be unlocked by defeating the 10-minute melee?
Is it true that Kirby, the protagonist of the Kirby game series, is pink?
In Mario Superstar Baseball what do you have to you use to unleash your characters super pitch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A star

questions.question: Does Nintendos mascot Mario wear a red and black hat?
In Mario Kart, characters are classified as either heavy or light.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Character and Game
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, video-games, command. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the third-person shooter Gears of War, can you kill the Corpser in the Locust tunnels by using the Hammer of Dawn?
Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee did not have a grapple ability?
Which Pokemon character in Super Smash Bros. Melee damages itself by using its B button moves?
In the Gears of War game, which member of Alpha Team is first found fighting in a small courtyard, alone and taunting the Locust?
In Gears of War, which of these creatures is blind, walks upright and hunts by smell?
What is the name of the Colonel who is in command according to the scenarios in Gears of War?
Which of the following game series featured the most Super Smash Bros. Melee characters?
Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee is unlocked by beating the game with a character from the same game?
Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee is the final boss of the normal game (Classic Mode)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Master Hand

questions.question: Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee does not have a saving Up B button move?
In Gears of War, if you stay in the dark and walk slowly, the mutant race Kryll wont attack you.
What is the name of the main character in the 2006 third-person shooter Gears of War?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marcus Fenix

questions.question: Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee could jump more than once in midair?
In video game Gears of War, these creatures let loose loud piercing shrieks when they attack but are generally easy to kill.
Which character in Super Smash Bros. Melee had the ability to pick up other characters and walk with them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donkey Kong

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Runescape and Game
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, pets, game. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these pets can you own in Runescape?
What is the name of character Iwazarus ex-wife in the action/adventure game Killer7?
In the Runescape game you get a fishing skillcape in the Legends Guild.
How many forms does the Calphite Queen have in the game Runescape?
In the action/adventure game Killer7, the name of the assassin who can change between seven deadly personalities is Harman Smith.
You can own a pet rock in the Runescape game.
Which voice-over actress, who has also done voices for Nickelodeon, is the voice of Kaede in Killer7?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tara Strong

questions.question: In Killer7, what is the character Con Smiths’ age?
Which of these Runescape creatures drops a Dragon 2H Sword?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chaos Elemental

questions.question: General RAAM is protected by the mutant race Kryll when you try to kill him on the train at the end of Gears of War.
Which of these dragons is the strongest in the Runescape game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Black Dragon

questions.question: What is the name of the city in Runescape that you unlock after the Lost City Quest?
Which of these is the postal service in Runescape?
Which persona from the Killer7 game is the one with the Scope on his/her Automatic?
Which difficulty setting can only be unlocked by completing Gears of War once on any difficulty?

quizzes.title: Geography Quiz: Game and Amn
quizzes.description: Test your geography knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Geography, places, profession. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was Mask De Smith’s profession before coming apart of the killers’ team in Killer7?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Professional wrestler

questions.question: What organization takes Imoen from you, after you escape the first level in the game Baldurs Gate II: Shadows of Amn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cowled Wizards

questions.question: Where can you get the gauntlets of ogre power in the game Baldurs Gate II: Shadows of Amn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Planar Sphere

questions.question: What animal is Santa on the 2005 RuneScape Christmas special?
In the 2007 RuneScape Easter special, what item or items do you earn by helping the Easter bunny?

options.text: An egg that you eat that brings you up one level
A ring that transforms you into an egg

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A chicken suit

questions.question: In the RuneScape game, the woodcutting skillcape lets you save a bird from a tree.
In the RuneScape game, it is illegal to use a macroer.
Who kidnaps Nalia in the game Baldurs Gate II: Shadows of Amn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Isaea Roenal

questions.question: What two special benefits do RuneScape members get?

options.text: special money and no extra lands
special tree logs and special locations
you can kill demons and go to the barbarian village

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: special tree logs and special locations

questions.question: Besides your Avatar, what other characters can you get at the beginning of the game Baldurs Gate II: Shadows of Amn?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Imoen, Jahiera, Minsc

questions.question: What ranger can you save in the game Baldurs Gate II: Shadows of Amn by defeating the Shadow lord in the ruin temple?
In the game Killer7, what is the name of Harmans maid?
On a non-member world in RuneScape, how many places can you travel to on the ship in Port Sarim?
The only time you can use the save feature in Killer7 is when character Samantha is in what costume?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maid uniform

questions.question: In the action/adventure Killer7, who is the only informant able to contact the Killer7 team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christopher Mills
